attributes.ai.input:
<instructions>
<role>
You are an internal routing assistant. Classify the request and produce a short question.
</role>

Primary message (main signal):
for the whole org pls - can you do that? Does github tooling offers to run task like that without checking every possible repo? Or does it have API to do so?

<slack_context_instructions>
The full Slack/GitHub thread may be available in <slack_context> inside the <context> block.
Use it to understand the current message, but prioritize the current message.
If the latest message is a correction or follow-up, use history to reconstruct context.
</slack_context_instructions>

<intent_options>

<option value="chat">
general Q&A, follow-up questions, small talk, or simple requests.
Also use for:
  - "what can you do?" / capabilities questions
  - "summarize this thread" / thread summary requests
These are handled via tags, not separate intents.

</option>

<option value="code_help">
user asks about code, implementation, documentation, debugg... [truncated]
